name: FirstHour - Cybercrime Response Pipeline (Groq + Real Data)

nodes.name: Fetch Helpline Database
nodes.notes: Reads the maintained helpline/chargeback database from Google Sheets. This is REAL data the AI cannot know — numbers, URLs, and windows that change over time.

nodes.name: Merge Real Data + Classification
nodes.notes: Matches the victim's payment platform against the helpline database to find relevant phone numbers, URLs, and chargeback windows. This is the KEY node that makes the pipeline more than just prompting.

parameters.subject: ={{ 'URGENT: Fraudulent Transaction Freeze Request - ' + $json.webhookData.paymentPlatform }}
parameters.message:
={{ 'Dear Fraud Desk,

A fraudulent transaction has been reported on platform ' + $json.webhookData.paymentPlatform + '.

Amount: ₹' + $json.webhookData.amountLost + '
Incident Time: ' + $json.webhookData.incidentTime + '

Please freeze these funds immediately as per RBI guidelines.

Description:
' + $json.webhookData.description + '

Regards,
FirstHour Automated System' }}

nodes.name: Email Bank Fraud Desk
nodes.notes: Sends details to the bank's fraud desk immediately

parameters.subject: FirstHour: Your Action Plan & Complaint Draft
parameters.message:
={{ 'Here is your personalized action plan and complaint draft.

' + JSON.stringify($json.actionPlan, null, 2) + '

COMPLAINT DRAFT:
' + $json.complaintDraft }}

nodes.name: Email Action Plan to Victim
nodes.notes: Emails the complete summary to the victim so they don't lose it

parameters.subject: FirstHour Reminder: Have you visited your bank branch?
parameters.message:
Hi,

It's been 2 hours since you reported the fraud. Have you visited your bank branch yet to secure a written acknowledgement? This is critical.

Stay strong.
FirstHour

parameters.subject: FirstHour Reminder: Have you filed the FIR?
parameters.message:
Hi,

It's been a day. Have you filed the FIR at your local police station? It is required for chargebacks and insurance.

FirstHour
